content: I've actually been eyeing a leather belt from Coach that I think would look great with the boots and jeans. I've been selling some of my gently used clothes on Poshmark, and I'm planning to use that money to treat myself to the belt. I've also been considering getting a new cashmere scarf to add a pop of color to my outfits - I recently got a soft cashmere scarf from a spa boutique, and it's been my go-to accessory for chilly mornings and evenings.
